Job Posting:166180 - Position: S25 Developer, Platform, Application Server 166180 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/03/2025 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 01/24/2025 11:11 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Kinaxis 700 Silver Seven Road Ottawa K2V 1C3 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description About the team 2025 - Summer S25 Developer, Platform, Application Server 166180 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 8 or 12 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 37.5 Major List TBD Maestro is a world-class, unique technology providing lightning fast calculations and powerful collaboration capabilities via its 1TB memory-based database, always-on analytics, simulation tools, and rich UI. In this role, you will develop web application features using a variety of technologies (TypeScript, React, C#) that will bring the power of Maestro to an expanding user community. This is a full-time, 4, 8, or 12-month position, starting May 2025. To be eligible for a Co-op or Intern position at Kinaxis, you must either be currently enrolled in full-time education or, if you are a recent/upcoming graduate, your graduation date must be within 12 months of the placement end date. What you will do In this role, you will be part of a team that will transform Maestro into a scalable platform and enable our customers and partners to build custom applications. • Conduct research, prototype new feature ideas • Develop high quality code that meets requirements • Work closely and collaboratively with the development team on a daily basis • Unit test modules and work with the test team on automation testing • Apply the Agile/Scrum development methodology to produce high quality software May perform additional projects upon request • Job Requirements What we are looking for • Currently enrolled in a program where software development is the primary focus. • Have previous experience in or familiar with C#, ASP.NET, TypeScript • A passion for developing great software • Solid knowledge of object oriented programming • Experience in the development of .NET applications • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills • Excellent verbal and communication skills Self-starter with strong initiative • Things that would definitely help • Experience with GIT Understanding of design patterns • Experience in multi-threaded programming • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Job closed Apply Via this Link - Co-op/Intern Developer, Platform, Application Server Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
